exercise.title: 09.07 Images
exercise.p: Make a program, that shows all the images in the array.

The (text) array is
var imageNames = ["face.png", "heart.png", "sun.png", "moon.png", "cloud.png"]; The ready-made images files are at https://myy.haaga-helia.fi/~swd1ta001/kuvat/. Save the images in the same folder as the html page that contains the JavaScript. You may also add you own image files as long as you also add the file name to the name array.
Use a for loop to show all the images. Use the document.write() method to write one new image element to the web page per each image. The image element should be like . E.g.
Submit a link to your code (myy or jsbin).
